casebody.data:
Robert Bryant MELSON, petitioner,
v.
Kim T. THOMAS, Commissioner, Alabama Department of Corrections. No. 13-6628. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 13, 2014.

Case below, 713 F.3d 1086.

*906Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.
